comments.body: I think the test should be split to three tests now. One test should test one thing only.

comments.body: Is there are any way we can verify that we are actually sending a Parquet file? could we for example try to read it and parse it via Parquet? I am not 100% sure but it seems a bit suspicious that we see the same OUTPUT_DATA being written in both CSV and Parquet case. Maybe I do not understand  it fully but I'd expect different output in both cases if I understand it correctly.
